snippet: Carlo’s Bake Shop Ridgewood is the first full-service offshoot of Carlo’s, the bake shop run by Buddy Valastro, the man behind two reality-television shows.
abstract: Carlo’s Bake Shop Ridgewood is first full-service offshoot of Carlo’s, bake shop run by Buddy Valastro, man behind reality-television shows The Cake Boss and Next Great Baker (Metropolitan/New Jersey).
lead_paragraph: Carlo’s Bake Shop Ridgewood is the first full-service offshoot of Carlo’s, the bake shop run by Buddy Valastro, the man behind two reality-television shows.

headline.seo: Real-World Growth, to Ridgewood, for the ‘Cake Boss’
